title: Vectors In Motion
description: This JSON schema describes a complete animation with vector graphics, frame by frame.

width.title: Width
width.description: The width (in pixels) of the animation.

height.title: Height
height.description: The height (in pixels) of the animation.

fps.title: Frames Per Second
fps.description: The number of frames per second of the animation.

assets.description: Map of assets in the animation indexed by ID.

frames.title: Frames
frames.description: Set of frames of the animation.

Frame.title: The schema of a frame of the animation
Frame.description: A frame of a animation contains the elements to be drawn in the canvas, messages to be displayed, etc.

items.title: Items
items.description: The items (i.e., elements) of a frame.

FrameItem.title: Frame Item
FrameItem.description: An item of a frame of a animation is a sprite which will be drawn in a certain position of the canvas with a given rotation and scale.

ViewWindow.title: View Window
ViewWindow.description: View window of the asset to display.

start_x.description: The x coordinate of the upper-left corner of the window.

start_y.description: The y coordinate of the upper-left corner of the window.

Text.title: Text
Text.description: A shape used to create text.

x.description: x coordinate of the starting point of the text baseline.

y.description: y coordinate of the starting point of the text baseline.

dx.description: Shifts the text position horizontally from a previous text element.

dy.description: Shifts the text position vertically from a previous text element.

r.description: Rotates orientation of each individual glyph. Can rotate glyphs individually.

tl.description: Defines a width that the text should be scaled to fit.

la.description: Defines how the text is stretched or compressed to fit the length.

attrs.description: Extra attributes that can be added to a text.

Line.title: Line
Line.description: A basic shape used to create a line connecting two points.

x1.description: x-axis coordinate of the line starting point.

y1.description: y-axis coordinate of the line starting point.

x2.description: x-axis coordinate of the line ending point.

y2.description: y-axis coordinate of the line ending point.

attrs.description: Extra attributes that can be added to a line.

Circle.title: Circle
Circle.description: A shape used to draw circles based on a center point and a radius.

cx.description: x-axis coordinate of the center of the circle.

cy.description: y-axis coordinate of the center of the circle.

attrs.description: Extra attributes that can be added to a circle.

Ellipse.title: Ellipse
Ellipse.description: A shape used to create ellipses based on a center coordinate, and both their x and y radius.

cx.description: x-axis coordinate of the center of the ellipse.

cy.description: y-axis coordinate of the center of the ellipse.

rx.description: Radius of the ellipse on the x-axis.

ry.description: Radius of the ellipse on the y-axis.

attrs.description: Extra attributes that can be added to a ellipse.

Rectangle.title: Rectangle
Rectangle.description: A shape used to create rectangles, defined by their position, width, and height. The rectangles may have their corners rounded.

x.description: x-axis coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.

y.description: y-axis coordinate of the top-left corner of the rectangle.

rx.description: The horizontal corner radius of the rect. Defaults to ry if it is specified.

ry.description: The vertical corner radius of the rect. Defaults to rx if it is specified.

attrs.description: Extra attributes that can be added to a ellipse.

Poly.title: Poly
Poly.description: A shape used to create polylines and polygons.

points.description: The list of points (pairs of x,y absolute coordinates) required to draw the poly.

attrs.description: Extra attributes that can be added to a ellipse.

Image.title: Image
Image.description: A shape used to create images.

asset.description: The ID of the asset linked to this shape.

x.description: x coordinate of the starting point of the image top-left corner.

y.description: y coordinate of the starting point of the image top-left corner.

w.description: The width of the image in the frame.

h.description: The height of the image in the frame.

r.description: The rotation of the image in the frame.

view_window.description: View window of the sprite to display.

attrs.description: Extra attributes that can be added to a ellipse.

ShapeAttributes.title: Shape Attributes
ShapeAttributes.description: Extra attributes that can be added to shapes.

style.title: Style
style.description: Allows to style an element using CSS declarations (ignored if drawing in canvas).

class.title: Class
class.description: Assigns a CSS class name or set of class names to an element (ignored if drawing in canvas).

clip_path.title: Clip Path
clip_path.description: Defines or associates a clipping path with the element.

fill.title: Fill
fill.description: Defines the color used to paint the element.

fill_opacity.title: Fill Opacity
fill_opacity.description: Defines the opacity of the filling color.

filter.title: Filter
filter.description: Filter effects that should be applied to element.

mask.title: Mask
mask.description: Associates a mask with the element.

opacity.title: Opacity
opacity.description: Defines the opacity of the element.

stroke.title: Stroke
stroke.description: Defines the color used to paint the outline of the shape.

stroke_width.title: Stroke Width
stroke_width.description: Defines the width of the stroke to be applied to the shape.

stroke_opacity.title: Stroke Opacity
stroke_opacity.description: Defines the opacity of the stroke color.

stroke_dasharray.title: Stroke Dash Array
stroke_dasharray.description: Defines the pattern of dashes and gaps used to paint the outline of the shape.

stroke_dashoffset.title: Stroke Dash Offset
stroke_dashoffset.description: Defines an offset on the rendering of the associated dash array.

stroke_linecap.title: Stroke Linecap
stroke_linecap.description: Defines the shape to be used at the end of open subpaths when they are stroked.

stroke_linejoin.title: Stroke Linejoin
stroke_linejoin.description: Defines the shape to be used at the corners of paths when they are stroked.

transform.title: Transform
transform.description: Defines a list of transform definitions that are applied to an element and the element.

Asset.title: Asset
Asset.description: An external asset used in the animation.

content.title: Content
content.description: Content of the asset (either a URL or a file name).
